Add New Gift Certificate:
Pattern examples:
50 - 1500 : a range between $50 and $1500
25; 50; 100 : a dropdown with values of $25, $50, $100
50 : a static value of $50
- : enter dash" to allow any amount value
For multi-currency setups enter configuration for each currency on new line
column3:
USD: 50; 100; 200
*: 100; 200; 500
Whitespaces are optional and will be ignored."
column4:
Esempio di valori validi:
50 - 1500 : tra € 50 e € 1500
25; 50; 100 : un menu a tendina con i valori di 25, 50, 100
50 : un valore fisso di € 50
- : inserisci -" per permettere qualsiasi importo
For multi-currency setups enter configuration for each currency on new line
column6:
USD: 50; 100; 200
*: 100; 200; 500
Whitespaces are optional and will be ignored."
